name: The Hero of Meta Cycles
description:
A strange figure gives you a challenge and the title of "The Hero of Meta Cycles". Will you fulfill the calling? :O

Featuring: A take on meta-narrative, where The Creator used cycles as a representation of progress.

Not featuring: The ending sequence / loop closure. Game Jams, amiright?! :P
(but I'm working on it)

Controls: Mouse

Created during 3 days for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3.

Credits:

  • Game Design and Programming - Victor Dias (me)
  • Unrevised Texts and UI Art  - Victor Dias (also me)
  • Characters Art - Diego Moreira (gifted as a custom jam diversifier!)
  • Icons Art - game-icons.net
  • Dialog System - Fungus (awesome plugin!)
  • Keeping me work-induced and awake - Snail's House (great chill vibes~)
  • Will to not give up (the jam, not life) - Murilo Costa and Mithril, the Cat
